sentences.en: Last, it analyzes the relationship between totemism and exogamy, and the three functions of exogamy.
sentences.cn: 最后, 本文分析了图腾崇拜和外婚制的关系, 以及外婚制的三大功能.

sentences.en: Totemism, for example, was a system as complex as the Linnaean classification.
sentences.cn: 比如, 图腾这个系统的复杂程度堪比林奈的植物学分类体系.

sentences.en: Trace of primitive religion development was from totemism and naturism to consanguineous ancestors adoration.
sentences.cn: 从图腾神、自然神崇拜到血缘祖先崇拜,这是原始宗教发展的轨迹.

trans.tran_en: the belief in kinship of groups or individuals having a common totem
